description: Retrieves the specified verified destination numbers.

parameters.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberIds
parameters.description: An array of VerifiedDestinationNumberid to retrieve. (string) ---

parameters.name: DestinationPhoneNumbers
parameters.description: An array of verified destination phone number, in E.164 format. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of VerifiedDestinationNumberFilter objects to filter the results. (dict) --- The filter definition for filtering verified destination phone numbers that meets a specified criteria. The name of the attribute to filter on. An array of values to filter on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to filter on.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: An array of values to filter on.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: VerifiedDestinationNumberId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the verified destination phone number.

nested_items.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The verified destination phone number, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the verified destination phone number.
PENDING: The phone number hasn't been verified yet.
VERIFIED: The phone number is verified and can receive messages.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the destination phone number was created, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. You don't need to supply a value for this field in the initial request.
